resources.string: Amazeファイルユーティリティ
Amazeファイルユーティリティ
File Utility app with inbuilt media players for all your needs.
ストレージへのアクセス権限がありません
App needs storage read permissions for optimal performance.
App needs notification permissions for optimal performance.
アクセス許可を付与する
Plays audio for Amaze File Utilities
最近使用したファイル
著作権 © 2021–2022 Team Amaze\n無断複写・転載を禁じます。
オープンソースライセンス
対応していないコンテンツ
申し訳ありませんが、それは起こっていないはずです。
Eメールでエラーを報告する
書式付きレポートをコピー
Please check whether an issue discussing your crash already exists.
申し訳ありませんが、エラーが発生したようです。
このドキュメントを開くにはパスワードを入力してください。
パスワードが間違っています。

html.body:
Since Android 11, Google requests File Managers to request user permission for managing all files on the device. Details here. 

Amaze File Utilities needs this permission too. After pressing "Grant"here, please select Allow access to manage all files option on the next screen. 

Canceling this dialog will exit the app.

You\'re being redirected to Amaze File Manager. It\'s our open source offering that has all features a modern file manager has completely free of cost with over 2M downloads and 4.3 rating on Play Store.

Help us translate Amaze in your language

Thank you for choosing Amaze File Utilities.
 We are a team of open source developers working hard to provide an ad-free experience, and your purchase will really help to keep us afloat.
 At any point if you need any help feel free to contact us in About section. You'll be able to contact directly to our team on Telegram.
 Please also try our open source file manager application 'Amaze File Manager' for a seamless file management experience.
試用期間がまもなく終了します。

Hey There! Thank you for choosing Amaze File Utilities. 
Your trial is going to expire tomorrow, we hope you've enjoyed our software, and we look forward for you to make a nominal payment. 
We are a team of open source developers working hard to provide an ad-free experience, and we need funds to keep us afloat.
You can write to us if you want to extend the trial period a bit more.
試用期間が終了しました

Hey There! Thank you for choosing Amaze File Utilities.
 Your trial has expired, we hope you've enjoyed our software, and we look forward for you to make a nominal payment.
 We are a team of open source developers working hard to provide an ad-free experience, and we need funds to keep us afloat.
 You can write to us if you want to extend the trial period a bit more.

Hey There! Thank you for choosing Amaze File Utilities.
 Your trial is inactive and you're not longer an exclusive member, we hope you've enjoyed our software, and we look forward for you to make a nominal payment.
 We are a team of open source developers working hard to provide an ad-free experience, and we need funds to keep us afloat.
 You can write to us if you want to extend the trial period a bit more.

Thank you for choosing Amaze File Utilities.
 We are a team of open source developers working hard to provide an ad-free experience, and your subscription will really help us in development.
 At any point if you need any help feel free to contact us in About section. You'll be able to contact directly to our team on Telegram.
 Please also try our open source file manager application 'Amaze File Manager' for a seamless file management experience.

Hey There! Thank you for choosing Amaze File Utilities.\n We\'re not able to validate your license, please connect to internet and restart the app.
メディアファイルを管理

View images, videos, audios, documents in list or grid
Open using inbuilt players
Gesture support for easy navigation
Jump to any date instantly
Group or sort list
Cast on TV

Analyse storage for junk files to delete
Group images by memes, low-light, blurry, selfies or group
Group large files in storage
Group old downloads, recordings or screenshots
Transfer data between devices through wifi\nHigh transfer speeds using android wifi direct
We need storage permissions to access your media files
We need notification permissions to show app operations
あなたの個人情報とプライバシーは大切です。

Don't like ads? Neither do we, we value your data as much as you do.
 We assure you that we do not collect any of your private information.
This is an open source software.
We're a group of open source developers and are managing Amaze mobile apps for around 8 years now.

We look forward to your subscription.

A value of zero means that the key is not changed.\nOne full step corresponds to one semitone.\nA change of -12 semitones means that the song is played one octave lower.
